sentence.Network_en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentence.Network_en: Drugs are a scourge that is devastating our society.
sentence.Network_cn: 毒品是破坏我们社会的一大祸害。

sentence.Network_en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ūre, of Germanic origin; related to us and German unser

encyclopedia.content: OUR oxygen uptake/utilization rate, 氧吸收/利用率，反映活性污泥微生物代谢状态的重要参数。 our 英音：['auə]美音：['aur] 代词 pron. 1. (we的所有格)我们的 例句：Our country is rich in resources. 我国资源丰富。 2.[口语]讲话者的朋友[亲戚]等，Our Barry worke theresq 我们的巴里在这里工作 3.宾格：usOUR 团队 这是一根杠杆帮你撬动生活Giveyourself a chance to hold your life 团队总述 OUR文化是于2008

entry.def: You use our to indicate that something belongs or relates both to yourself and to one or more other people.

example.tran: 我们怀上了第一个孩子。

example.ex: I locked myself out of our apartment and had to break in...
example.tran: 我把自己锁在了我们的公寓外面，不得不破门而入。

entry.def: A speaker or writer sometimes uses our to indicate that something belongs or relates to people in general.

example.ex: The quality of our life depends on keeping well...
example.tran: 我们的生活质量取决于健康状况。

example.ex: We are all entirely responsible for our actions, and for our reactions.
example.tran: 我们都对自己的行为和反应负全责。

entry.tran: （与家庭成员的姓名连用）我家的
entry.def: Speakers sometimes use our with the name of a member of their family.

example.ex: Our Barry had a habit of doing that sort of thing.
example.tran: 我家巴里就习惯干那种事。
